text: The Skin I Live In () is a 2011 Spanish American science fiction thriller movie directed by Pedro Almodóvar and was based on the novel Tarantula by Thierry Jonquet. It stars Antonio Banderas, Elena Anaya, Marisa Paredes, Jan Cornet, Roberto Álamo, Blanca Suárez. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:2011 thriller movies Category:2011 LGBT movies Category:Spanish science fiction movies Category:Spanish thriller movies Category:Spanish LGBT movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Pedro Almodóvar Category:Movies set in Madrid
title: The Skin I Live In
